Html:
I want to use xmlns:dte="http://schemas.firstfloorsoftware.com/documenttoolkit/extensions" in my silverlight application,
I have added firstfloor.documents.dll, firstfloor.documents.controls.dll & firstfloor.documents.pdf.dll but still i am not able to access "extensions" can you please let me know which dll i need to add
Silverlight is not supported, WPF 4 and 4.5 are.
